name: Bland AI
headline: The enterprise platform for AI phone calls

founders.name: Isaiah Granet, Founder
founders.description:
building things that talk back. 

no more waiting on hold, no more phone trees. 

the future is bland.

founders.name: Sobhan Nejad, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Bland AI. Building the enterprise platform for AI phone calling.

## What is Bland.
### AI phone agents that sound human, speak any language, and work 24/7.
Bland makes it simple to integrate the latest conversational AI technology into your business. Build the perfect employee to handle sales, scheduling, and all your customer support needs. Bland’s AI phone agents sound human, can speak any language, and work 24/7.All for $0.09 a minute.
[Sign up today](https://bland.com/<http:/app.bland.ai/signup>)[Enterprise](https://bland.com/</enterprise>)
## How Bland is built.
### Self-hosted, end-to-end infrastructure.
Bland provides fully self-hosted, end-to-end infrastructure. That means faster response times, 99.99% uptime, and guaranteed security for your--and your customer’s--data. And your marginal call costs? Zero.
[Enterprise](https://bland.com/</enterprise>)
#### Write custom prompts
Provide your agent with sample dialogue and relevant details to personalize interactions with your customers.
#### Scale usage anytime
Auto-scaling infrastructure allows you to handle thousands of calls, any time.
#### Seamlessly exchange data
Seamlessly exchange dataDynamic integrations built with our API send your data wherever it needs to go.
#### Set strict guardrails
Seamlessly exchange dataDynamic integrations built with our API send your data wherever it needs to go.
## How Bland works.
### Book an appointment. Update a CRM. Send a text. All in one workflow.
Pathways are the brain of your business. We integrate into your existing systems, whether it’s a scheduler, ERP, or CRM, so your agents don’t just talk, they take action. You map out the conversation and define the decisions your AI makes. Bland does the rest.
## Build with Conversational Pathways.
### Meet Pathways-- the programming language for hallucination-proof AI.
![meet Bland AI Thumbnail](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cddff3a7bb08f0bc015747/6786fd045706691649d5d70f_yt_thumb.svg)
## Bland in action.
### Every day, Bland handles millions of calls. Take a listen.
YouTube Video Embed

## Bland works with enterprises.
### Bland is built to meet the evolving demands of modern enterprises.
Bland offers scalable solutions, real-time analytics, and 99.99% uptime to help you deliver exceptional customer experiences.
### Your OS for customer experience.
For Enterprises, Bland goes beyond phone calls. You'll gain access to campaign analytics, model fine tuning, warm transfers, SMS, and even the ability to hook up any external tool to take actions at the right moment in any conversation.
[Talk to sales](https://bland.com/</enterprise>)
### Dedicated infrastructure for infinite scale.
Customer's call at critical moments-when they need help or when they're ready to take action. With dedicated infrastructure, your enterprise will be prepared to scale and handle any number of concurrent calls with up to five 9's of uptime.
[Enterprise](https://bland.com/<#>)
### Your Operating Procedures, implemented with our help.
Our team will work directly with your call center, operations, and engineering teams to craft an agent that not only achieves the end business outcome but sounds incredibly realistic, using best in class prompt engineering to ensure the conversation sounds natural and is effective.
[Enterprise](https://bland.com/</enterprise>)
## Bland Security.
### Own your customer experience end-to-end.
Bland provides end-to-end infrastructure so your customer experience is never reliant on big model providers. That means faster response times, 99.99% uptime and fewer dependencies on external factors. All while driving your marginal call costs to zero.
#### Data in-House
We store and manage your information in-house, reducing external risks and maintaining full control over your data.
#### SOC2 Type Il Compliant
We follow strict security protocols and regularly monitor our systems to ensure your data remains protected.
#### PCI DSS Compliant
We protect specific information, like cardholder data, from conversations based on your needs.
#### HIPAA Compliant
Prioritize the security and privacy of sensitive customer data, ensuring full protection throughout your experience.
#### Regular Pen Tests
We simulate cyberattacks to identify weaknesses, ensuring your systems stay secure against emerging threats.
#### Constant Unit Tests
We ensure continuous security by identifying and addressing vulnerabilities in real time.
#### Expert Implementation
We ensure your security measures are seamlessly integrated, protecting your systems from day one.
#### Robust Guardrails
Ensure your data and operations are secure, with built-in protections against risks and vulnerabilities.

generated_description:
**Bland AI: Revolutionizing Phone Interactions with AI**

Founded in 2023 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Bland AI is an ambitious startup making waves in the realm of AI-powered phone calls. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S23, this 13-person team is committed to perfecting the art of conversational AI for enterprises.

### Mission and Offering
Bland AI's mission is straightforward: to deliver an enterprise platform that enables businesses to leverage ultra-realistic AI phone calls. Their technology facilitates seamless customer interactions around the clock—offering agents that sound human, can converse in any language, and all at an impressive rate of just $0.09 per minute. 

### How It Works
With a robust, self-hosted infrastructure, Bland guarantees quick response times and 99.99% uptime. This level of reliability is critical for businesses that rely on customer interactions, and Bland's AI agents do more than speak—they can integrate into existing business systems to manage tasks like booking appointments or updating customer records. 

The real magic lies in their proprietary "Conversational Pathways," which empower users to customize their agents with tailored dialogues and action prompts. This flexibility is key for businesses that want to ensure that every call not only represents their brand voice but also achieves specific business outcomes effectively.

### Why Choose Bland AI?
Bland's solution comes with enhanced security features, including SOC2 and HIPAA compliance, and a commitment to protecting customer data without relying on external providers. This plays a significant role in ensuring that customer interactions remain private and secure. 

### The Bigger Picture
In a world increasingly leaning towards automation, Bland AI stands out by offering a product that does more than just simulate conversation—it actually integrates with business operations to enhance customer experiences. With dedicated infrastructure and real-time analytics, Bland positions itself as an essential tool for modern enterprises looking to scale their customer support capabilities without sacrificing quality.

With a bright future ahead, Bland AI is set to change how companies interact with their customers over the phone. It's a blend of technology and empathy—bridging the gap between artificial intelligence and authentic customer service. If you’re looking to elevate your customer interactions through AI, Bland AI is certainly one to watch.
